title: UAE So Strong It’s Attacking Entire Teams, Not Just Rivals: ‘Now We Are Comfortable in Yellow’
content:
UAE is leaving nothing to chance as Pogačar takes control of the Tour de France: 'It was important to see the level of each team.'

Read the full article at UAE So Strong It’s Attacking Entire Teams, Not Just Rivals: ‘Now We Are Comfortable in Yellow’ on Velo.
author: ahood
